column2: Sandun Village & Jeep Safari in Hiriwadunna
column11: We had a great time. A nice walk on the lake then a carriage ride We learned how to prepare a Curry. The officials took pictures of us during the carriage ride. Nice activity.

column2: Sandun Village & Jeep Safari in Hiriwadunna
column8: Such an incredible, trip we will never forget!!
column11: What an incredible experience!  We were traveling with an 8 yr old and a 3 year old and the way every portion of this trip made them feel special created the most memorable day!  Starting with an ox cart ride, a canoe ride, then a local village family shared how to create a coconut dish before we were served an incredible meal that the kids ate everything!!!  It was a day we will never forget!  This tour is a MUST!

column2: Sandun Village & Jeep Safari in Hiriwadunna
column8: A variety of travel, skilful crafts all in one package
column11: This is well worth a gander, first you will be taken by Tuktuk to where you will meet your oxen pulled carriage, if you are lucky enough to have a good guide they will take lots of photos and videos of you as you embark on your journey down the track, passing through the paddy fields and get to see some of the stilted tents where night farmers spend the nights making calls to deter wildlife from their crop. You will be met at the bottom of the track by your river guide, a little walk further will get you to the edge of the lake which is a lot bigger than what you will expect. The catamaran owner will navigate through the reeds and show you some of the skillfull crafts  using water lilies making hats and necklaces in seconds. Such a peaceful part of your day.  You will get the opportunity to visit a hut where a lady will show you how she cooks and prepares meals, fresh and tasty, simple and quick makes you wonder why additives, emulsifiers, and all those additional ingredients are put in store purchased foods. As you make your way back across the waters you are returned to the starting point by Jeep which ironically enough appears a lot bumpier a ride than when riding in the back of the carriage.

column2: Sandun Village & Jeep Safari in Hiriwadunna
column8: Without a doubt go for it, It is a simple tour but an elegant experience that you will leave with amazing memories.
column11: top to bottom we were handled in an excellent manner. Huge thanks to sandun your coordination excellent, service excellent, simple tour but elegant experience  loved it. Team up with the village for three deference experience and their kind welcoming and explaining excellent. 'karuna mama' bullock cart ride and his explain on village superb. Pathumâ€™s catabarang boat ride on hiriwadunna river and his crativity of crating Lilly flower in to a beautiful necklace,Lilly leafe in to a pirate hat and the yummy lotus buds my child loved the total experience. Seetha and Nadee in the village prepared a simple and very delicious lunch thank you for your hospitality we loved it. As a traveller and citizen i feel proud & amazed by your team work get to gather for this village tour experience. And we wish to come back again for another amazing tour with Sandun in the near future. Highly recommend their service.!

column2: Sandun Village & Jeep Safari in Hiriwadunna
column11: As a Tour Guide since 2015  I Recommend Sadun Safari for my clients and everyone super  happy Great Traditional Food with smiley Faces Traditional Activities Live cooking Fresh vegetables from the garden Clean Safari Jeeps with friendly Drivers I Thank Sadun providing quality of the service same as always
